text:
current research and practices:
- Town Crier: <http://www.initc3.org/files/tc.pdf>
- oracle: <https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Contract#Example_4:_Using_external_state>, <https://blog.ethereum.org/2014/07/22/ethereum-and-oracles/>
- TLS notary: <http://ethereum.stackexchange.com/questions/201/how-does-oraclize-handle-the-tlsnotary-secret>
<@U13TWBRBL>: I'd also throw this one to the mix: <http://blog.oraclize.it/2016/02/18/understanding-oracles/>
